CustomField.inlineHelpText: To be used by Order Management to include on automated notification to the DOS that their contract has been rejected.
CustomField.label: Rejection Reason

value.fullName: Contract Contains Scratch-Off's, Notations or Deletions
value.label: Contract Contains Scratch-Off's, Notations or Deletions

value.fullName: Other
value.label: Other

value.fullName: Contract Authorizer doesn’t exist in SF/Insite
value.label: Contract Authorizer doesn’t exist in SF/Insite

value.fullName: Opty/quote needs to be updated to match signed contract
value.label: Opty/quote needs to be updated to match signed contract

value.fullName: Bundle must be reviewed and submitted by Contract Support.
value.label: Bundle must be reviewed and submitted by Contract Support.

value.fullName: Approval for special terms or pricing required
value.label: Approval for special terms or pricing required

value.fullName: Wrong or no contract attached to opty or emailed to Order Management
value.label: Wrong or no contract attached to opty or emailed to Order Management

value.fullName: Multiple reasons – See comments for details
value.label: Multiple reasons – See comments for details

value.fullName: Assistance needed from other internal area – OM will re-submit
value.label: Assistance needed from other internal area – OM will re-submit

value.fullName: Account on Credit Hold – Seller needs to work with collections
value.label: Account on Credit Hold – Seller needs to work with collections

value.fullName: Incorrect T’s and C’s attached to contract
value.label: Incorrect T’s and C’s attached to contract

value.fullName: Contract not signed – must get signature and re-submit to OM
value.label: Contract not signed – must get signature and re-submit to OM

value.fullName: Incomplete contract attached – see comments
value.label: Incomplete contract attached – see comments

value.fullName: Duplicate optys found, DOS needs to advise of duplicate reason
value.label: Duplicate optys found, DOS needs to advise of duplicate reason

value.fullName: Missing implementation/authorized admin forms
value.label: Missing implementation/authorized admin forms

value.fullName: Missing implementation contact details
value.label: Missing implementation contact details

value.fullName: Property on DO NOT SELL LIST/Market booking cap exceeded
value.label: Property on DO NOT SELL LIST/Market booking cap exceeded

value.fullName: Property not on DIRECT CENSUS or missing DFA/ITD signed doc
value.label: Property not on DIRECT CENSUS or missing DFA/ITD signed doc

value.fullName: Rejected per request from DOS/AM/RM/Contract Support/GID
value.label: Rejected per request from DOS/AM/RM/Contract Support/GID

value.fullName: Tech issue – waiting for L3 assistance – no action from DOS needed
value.label: Tech issue – waiting for L3 assistance – no action from DOS needed

value.fullName: Media plan to be updated by MCM in Insite – no action from DOS needed
value.label: Media plan to be updated by MCM in Insite – no action from DOS needed

value.fullName: Hotel not live on GDS. Contract cannot be processed at the moment
value.label: Hotel not live on GDS. Contract cannot be processed at the moment

value.fullName: Contract discrepancy with system records – clarification from DOS needed
value.label: Contract discrepancy with system records – clarification from DOS needed

value.fullName: Pending client acknowledgement of revised start dates
value.label: Pending client acknowledgement of revised start dates
